flawed_nl_solution:
The public foundation will have $2500 x 80/100 = $<<2500*80/100=12500/4>>12500/4.
So, each of the organizations will receive $12500/4 / 8 = $<<12500/4/8=3125/8>>3125/8.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 12500/4. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
